articles.author: Hakyung Kim, Christopher Hayes
articles.title: These are the cheapest tech stocks in the S&P 500 - CNBC
articles.description: CNBC Pro screened for companies with the lowest forward P/E ratios relative to the average in the S&P 500 tech sector.
